review_data.title: Again nice experience with good food.
review_data.content: Again we had a nice experience with the special food here. The people working here make the hometown specialties or dishes from where they come from. So the menu is different every couple of months, which makes it interessting coming here. The food was very...More

review_data.title: Nice restaurant with good food
review_data.content: This restaurant belongs to a charity foundation and they have an work-integration programm. So people from different countries work here and get some work experience. They can also cook native dishes, which come on the menu. Which is pretty cool. The restaurant is located in...More
